Package org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.parse

Exceptions in this package are caused by syntax errors in templates.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TemplateErrorInfo
    This was created so that we have something that can isolate the line where the error occured and adjust the Exception message to include it.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbstractParsingException
    Acts as the base class for all exceptions in this package.
    AttrNameBlankException
    Thrown when an AttrSection tag does not specify a Section name or an attribute name.
    AttrSectionMissingSpaceException
    DEPRECATED
    AttrSectionNoEndQuoteException
    Thrown when an AttrSection element finds the attribute with the starting quote, but no end quote.
    AttrSectionNoSuchAttributeException
    Thrown when an AttrSection element references an attribute that does not exist.
    FillinHasNoSlotNameException
    Thrown when a Fillin element does not specify a Slot to fill in.
    FillinNoSuchSlotException
    Thrown when an Fillin references a nonexistent Slot.
    IllegalTagPlacementException
    Thrown when a template tag can only be valid within the context of certain enclosing tags and there is no such enclosing tag present, and when a tag is enclosed within a tag that should not contain it.
    IncludeCircularException
    Thrown when an Include is "circular", i.e.
    IncludeHasNoPathException
    Thrown when an Include element has no reference to an external template to load.
    IncludeNestedException
    Thrown when an included file fails to parse.
    IncludeReferencesMissingSectionException
    Thrown when an Include tag specifies a section that does not exist in the included template.
    InternalTemplateException
    Thrown in various cases when the parser fails because of a bug.
    NoTailOfTagException
    Thrown when the starting delimiter & name of a valid tag is found, but the closing delimiter is not found.
    NoTextWithinTagException
    Thrown when an Include or Show element contains non-whitespace, non-tag text.
    RemoveMissingTargetException
    Thrown when a Remove element does not specify a Section or Slot to remove.
    RemoveNoSuchElementException
    Thrown when an Remove references a nonexistent Section/Slot.
    RenameHasExtraParametersException
    Thrown when a Rename element has parameters beyond the optional Section/Slot, the old name, and the new name.
    RenameHasNoParametersException
    Thrown when a Rename element has no parameters.
    RenameMissingSecondParameterException
    Thrown when a Rename element doesn't have a second parameter.
    RenameMissingThirdParameterException
    Thrown when a Rename element doesn't have a third parameter.
    RenameNoSuchTagException
    Thrown when a Rename references a Slot or Section element that does not exist.
    SectionHasNoNameException
    Thrown when a Section element does not specify a name for the Section.
    ShowHasNoSectionNameException
    Thrown when a Show element does not specify the name of a Section.
    ShowNoSuchSectionException
    Thrown when an Show references a nonexistent Section.
    SlotHasNoNameException
    Thrown when a Slot tag does not specify a name.
    TagHasTooManyParametersException
    Thrown when the starting delimiter & name of a valid tag is found, but the closing delimiter is not found.
    TagNotClosedException
    Thrown when a tag such as Section or Fillin does not have a closing tag.
    TagWithNoParametersException
    Thrown when a TagWith element does not specify a shortcut or delimiters, i.e.
    TagWithNothingToRevertToException
    Thrown when a TagWith Revert appears without TagWith having first been used to change tagging options.
    TagWithUnexpectedNameException
    Thrown when a TagWith tag uses a shortcut name that is not in the standard list.
    TemplateContentException
    Acts as the base class for most exceptions in this package.
    TemplateNestedException
    Always thrown with a nested exception.
    UnmatchedQuoteException
    Thrown when a Remove element does not specify a Section or Slot to remove.

Package org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.parse Description

Exceptions in this package are caused by syntax errors in templates. The inheritance hierarchy of exceptions is:
  • AbstractParsingException
    • TemplateNestedException: Always thrown when a template cannot be parsed. Provides the name of the template. Always contains another Exception, either a TemplateContentException or another TemplateNestedException.
    • TemplateContentException: Abstract class for all other parsing Exceptions.
      • IncludeNestedException: Thrown when an Include fails because of errors in an included template. Always contains an Exception that describes the actual syntax error.
      • All the other Exceptions. These do not have any "nesting" and describe a specific syntax error.
